thread.title: Groom dies minutes before tying knot
thread.title_full: Groom dies minutes before tying knot

title: Groom dies minutes before tying knot
text:
Groom dies minutes before tying knot Web Report /Tumakuru   
Representational Image (Picture via Indian Express) The groom suddenly collapsed on the stage when he was getting ready for the wedding rituals. A wedding ceremony turned into mourning in Karnataka when 28-year-old groom suddenly died of heart attack. According to the Times of India, Vasanth Kumar, a M. Tech graduate, suffered heart attack in the marriage hall. The groom suddenly collapsed on the stage when he was getting ready for the wedding rituals. Kumar was to marry a girl from Madhugiri at the Gaviranga hall. "He had no known health problems. We are all shocked,"Raveesh, a relative of Kumar was quoted saying. Share
